Place Books and Papers in Metropolitan Areas.--We are living in a time when a great work is to be done. There is a famine in the land for the pure gospel, and the bread of life 


                                                      311 

is to be given to hungry souls. There is no better opportunity to do this work than that offered to the consecrated canvasser. Thousands of books containing the precious light of present truth should be placed in the homes of the people in our large cities....
